# GET /v1/gameCenterGroups/{id}/relationships/gameCenterChallenges | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/gameCenterGroups/{id}/relationships/gameCenterChallenges ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecentergroups-_id_-relationships-gamecenterchallenges)

-  GET /v1/gameCenterGroups/{id}/relationships/gameCenterChallenges 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/gameCenterGroups/{id}/relationships/gameCenterChallenges

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecentergroups-_id_-relationships-gamecenterchallenges#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterGroups/{id}/relationships/gameCenterChallenges
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecentergroups-_id_-relationships-gamecenterchallenges#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecentergroups-_id_-relationships-gamecenterchallenges#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecentergroups-_id_-relationships-gamecenterchallenges#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[GameCenterGroupGameCenterChallengesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecentergroupgamecenterchallengeslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecentergroups-_id_-relationships-gamecenterchallenges#see-also)

### [Managing challenges](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecentergroups-_id_-relationships-gamecenterchallenges#Managing-challenges)

[`Read challenge information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterchallenges-_id_)Get information for a specific Game Center challenge.[`Read the versions for a challenge`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterchallenges-_id_-versions)Get a list of versions for a specific Game Center challenge.[`Create a challenge`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-gamecenterchallenges)Add a challenge to a Game Center detail or group by referencing an existing leaderboard.[`Modify a challenge`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterchallenges-_id_)Update details for a specific Game Center challenge.[`Modify the leaderboard for a challenge`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterchallenges-_id_-relationships-leaderboard)Update the relationship between a leaderbaord and a specific Game Center challenge.[`Modify the challenges minimum platform version for a Game Center detail`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-relationships-challengesminimumplatformversions)Update the relationship between a challenges minimum platform version and a specific Game Center detail.[`Delete a challenge`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-gamecenterchallenges-_id_)Remove a specific Game Center challenge.[`Read the challenges for a Game Center detail`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-gamecenterchallenges)Get challenge information for a specific Game Center detail.[`Read the challenges for a Game Center group`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecentergroups-_id_-gamecenterchallenges)Get challenge information for a specific Game Center group.[`Read the challenges for a Game Center group`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecentergroups-_id_-gamecenterchallenges)Get challenge information for a specific Game Center group.
